quote: When you are at a loss of words then go with your feelings. If you feel nothing you must rely on your thinking. If your thinking is not clear then lean on the spirit. With Spirit you cannot go wrong!
quote_letters: WHEN YOU ARE AT A LOSS OF WORDS THEN GO WITH YOUR FEELINGS IF YOU FEEL NOTHING YOU MUST RELY ON YOUR THINKING IF YOUR THINKING IS NOT CLEAR THEN LEAN ON THE SPIRIT WITH SPIRIT YOU CANNOT GO WRONG
